title: Samsung will accept cryptocurrency payments
body: Samsung has begun accepting cryptocurrency payments in the Baltic countries - Lithuania, Latvia and Estonia. The second signatory is the CopPay cryptographic payment platform. There are three Samsung points in Vilnius itself, where you can pay for electronic equipment in cryptocurrencies, ie BTC, ETH, DASH, NEM, STEEM, XRP and LTC.
gallery: The CopPay platform is a European company from the FinTech industry and offers payment solutions for clients using cryptocurrency. Mediates in 31 outlets, including in Samsung's sections. Customers from Tallinn, Riga, Vilnius and Kaunas in the countries of Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania will be able to buy smartphones, tablets, laptops, Samsung TVs and other electronic equipment using cryptocurrency.
